reviews.review_title: Beautiful hotel, shame about the late check in.
reviews.positive_text: We had a family room and it was perfect, the comfiest beds, great big space, big TV, and situated in the garden so easy access to the pool and quiet away from the main building, we slept so well!
reviews.negative_text:
We left our bags at the property in the morning, went back to check in at 3pm only to be told that the room wasn't ready and it would be ready in 45 mins. So we waited in the bar, and after 45 mins i went to check, only to be told it would be another 30 mins. Eventually an hour and half later it was ready. It was not ideal to not be able to check in when you are waiting around with a 3 year old, on a rainy day. I think this could have been handled better.  

I think the rooms could have benefitted from a mini fridge.

I also think it was a little on the expensive side considering breakfast was not included.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Familiale Deluxe

reviews.review_title: It was Ok.... but, from the description, we had hoped for outstanding!
reviews.positive_text: The breakfast was excellent
reviews.negative_text:
There were a number of very obvious stains on the carpet which distracted from the overall cleanliness and fresh decor of the room. The manager said that she was aware of these"ink" stains and that they planned to close the room. Why were we given this room? We booked 5 months before and other rooms were showing as available so we wondered why the hotel would use this room when they were aware of the issue. 
Another disappointment was the lack of any information in the room, all was given verbally so lots to remember!
Also no toiletries provided except the shower gel and soap, unusual in a hotel of this standard.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux - Vue sur Mer

reviews.review_title: A beautiful little hotel well located for hikes and relaxation on Groix
reviews.positive_text: The breakfast was tailored to our wishes as there were few guests in the hotel during our stay. It was delicious. The bed was very comfortable and the hotel clean and presentable. The garden and courtyard were lovely. We loved the mini spa which was prepared for us every day to fit with our return from hiking.
reviews.negative_text: The room was a little small but absolutely adequate. The sea view was not as direct as we had hoped. We were disappointed that the restaurant attached to the hotel was closed and this information was not available at the time of booking. However, we found other great options.
